deposit_points_description: Request to deposit points into your account.
home_meta_description: Welcome to Point - Your modern web application
hero_subtitle: Experience seamless financial management with Point, an AI-powered platform designed to optimize your transactions and provide intelligent insights.
ai_capabilities_subtitle: Intelligent Financial Insights at Your Fingertips
ai_capabilities_description: Point leverages advanced artificial intelligence to provide personalized financial analysis, fraud detection, and spending pattern recognition, helping you make smarter financial decisions.
feature_pfa_description: Our AI analyzes your spending habits and income to provide tailored recommendations for saving and investment.
feature_rfd_description: Advanced algorithms monitor your transactions for suspicious activity, ensuring the security of your funds.
feature_sbf_description: Predict future expenses and optimize your budget with AI-driven forecasting tools.
feature_spr_description: Understand where your money goes with intelligent categorization and visualization of your spending.
technologies_subtitle: Built with Modern and Robust Technologies
technologies_description: Point is developed using a powerful and scalable technology stack to ensure high performance, security, and a seamless user experience.
tech_frontend_description: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS for a dynamic and responsive user interface.
tech_backend_description: NestJS, TypeScript for a robust and scalable API.
tech_database_description: MongoDB for flexible and efficient data storage.
tech_ai_ml_description: Advanced algorithms and models for financial analysis, fraud detection, and predictive insights.
footer_text: © 2025 Point. Built with ❤️ using modern web technologies.
signin_existing_account_link: sign in to your existing account
tech_i18n_figma_description: Implemented multi-language support using i18n and synchronized design components with Figma tokens in the monorepo UI for consistent design.
